text: Ete kona sandeha ne'i ye, yara imana eneche, desa tyaga kareche, sbiya jana o mala dbara allahara rahe jehada kareche ebam yara taderake asraya o sahayya sahayata diyeche, tara eke aparera sahayaka. Ara yara imana eneche kintu desa tyaga kareni tadera bandhutbe tomadera prayojana ne'i yataksana na tara desatyaga kare. Abasya yadi tara dharmiya byapare tomadera sahayata kamana kare, tabe tadera sahayya kara tomadera kartabya. Kintu tomadera sathe yadera sahayogi cukti bidyamana rayeche, tadera mokabelaya naya. Bastutah tomara ya kichu kara, allaha sesaba'i dekhena.
